actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a national marketing quota for the 1976 crop of flue-cured tobacco which is 25 percent less than the quota established for the 1975 crop of such tobacco.

summary.text: Directs the Serectary of Agriculture to establish a national marketing quota for the 1976 crop of flue-cured tobacco which is 25 percent less than the quota established for the 1975 crop of such tobacco.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a national marketing quota for the 1976 crop of flue-cured tobacco which is 25 percent less than the quota established for the 1975 crop of such tobacco.
